title: Can you change your Hostgator domain name? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on if you mean “change” your primary reseller account name, as they use your first domain name that you used when signing up with your HostGator account. Or, to change any domain name? If you are referring to changing your HostGator account domain name to a different one, then open a support ticket via your account area. The folks at HostGator are very accommodating. If you mean can you change the domain name by itself, then no. You would need to purchase another domain name. Good Luck!
